examples: She took good care of her body by exercising regularly.
The accident caused severe injuries to his body.
Ela cuidava bem do seu corpo fazendo exercícios regularmente.
O acidente causou ferimentos graves em seu corpo.

suggested: Why did the skeleton refuse to go to the party? He had no body to go with!
Sometimes, the word 'body' can remind us of times when we felt insecure or struggled with body image.
Why do some people judge others based on their appearance or make hurtful comments about their bodies? It's so frustrating and unfair!
Did you know that the human body consists of various systems, organs, and cells, working together to sustain life?
There's no specific smell associated with the word 'body', but it can evoke memories of scents related to personal care products or physical activities.
The experience of feeling the texture, warmth, and sensations of your own body or someone else's through touch, hugs, or physical contact.
Our bodies are the vessel through which we experience the world, connect with others, and express ourselves, embodying our unique identities and experiences.
